name: Hex: Origins
description: Hex: Origins is a casual puzzle game based on a complete hexagon themed colorful experience. Enjoy a refreshing, calming and original experience, which is extremely easy to pick up but hard to master as you progress in the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Any
